title: Document Headers
description: Captures information about the document's predecessor and submittor.

id_msg_pred.title: Message ID of Predecessor
id_msg_pred.description: Message ID of the document that preceded this document:

url_ipfs_pred.title: IPFS URL of Predecessor
url_ipfs_pred.description: IPFS URL of the document that preceded this document:

id_msg_lic.title: Message ID of Submittor License
id_msg_lic.description: Message ID of the relevant license of the submittor of this document:

url_ipfs_lic.title: IPFS URL of Submittor License
url_ipfs_lic.description: IPFS URL of the relevant license of the submittor of this document:

id_subject.title: Subject ID
id_subject.description: ID of the subject of this document (e.g., project ID or agent ID):

type_subject.title: Subject Type
type_subject.description: Type of the subject of this document:
